programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Tim, Allan ja Jasmine kokevat Alaskan ilmaston raakuuden lahtiessaan retkelle, jolla ylitetaan jokia ja jaatikoita ja kamppaillaan lumimyrskyssa.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Nelivuotias maltanterrieri Therodore saapuu sairaalaan mystisten oireiden takia. Koiran tilan heiketessa laakarit tuskailevat diagnoosin kanssa.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Dan McKernan jatti kaupunkielaman taakseen, muutti Michiganin maaseudulle ja perusti maatilalleen elainsuojelualueen. Sarjassa otetaan katsaus tilan sydanta lammittaviin pelastustarinoihin ja jokapaivaiseen elamaan.

programme.title: Shark After Dark
programme.desc: Hait ovat tunnetusti aktiivisia ja aggressiivisia paivisin, mutta niiden oisesta kayttaytymisesta tiedetaan hyvin vahan. Sukeltajat laskeutuvat pimeyteen saamaan lisatietoa.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Haikalojen erikoistuntijat Brandon McMillan ja Jimi Partington palaavat Guadalupen saarelle etsimaan maailman suurinta isoa valkohaita, joka tunnetaan nimella Deep Blue.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Jaksossa nahdaan ruokaa varasteleva ja taloa tuhoava kissa, jaakaapissa tuhoa aiheuttava kani ja koira, joka jahtaa jaateloautoa niin kauan, etta se saa mehujaatelon.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: The Browns begin an ambitious barn build, the key to Billys grand vision. Plus, Noah returns, reuniting the entire wolfpack for the first time since Alaska.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa parjaaminen riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Dokumenttisarja. Tiimi kulkee vihjeen perassa syrjaiselle joelle Gronlannissa, mista pitaisi loytya rautua. He selvittavat myos tarua, jonka mukaan atlantinlohi pesii joella.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Grace-vauva tutkii maailmaa, samalla kun Robert ja tiimi yrittavat tehda Australian elaintarhan suurimman alligaattorin siirron. Terri avustaa sumatrannorsuja.

programme.title: Project Grizzly
programme.desc: Karhunkouluttaja Jeff Watson palauttaa kaksi suojattiaan, Bobin ja Screetchin takaisin luontoon. Onko karhuilla selviamiseen tarvittavat taidot hallussa?

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: The Barn Sanctuaryn porsaat ovat valmiita muuttamaan uuteen tilavaan palatsiinsa. Henkilokunta jarjestaa Andy-lehman kuoleman jalkeen muistotilaisuuden.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff loytaa koiralta ison kasvaimen. Elainlaakariteknikko Kelly hoitaa oman koiransa auringonpolttamaa kirsua. Elainlaakarit Baier ja Hector hoitavat yhdessa biisonia.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Liikemies Brad Jennings tilaa uuden toimistonsa loppusilaukseksi kolme akvaariota. Niissa nakyy lisahuoneita, joista yhdessa on jopa toimiva takka!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat uivat alligaattorivesissa pelastaakseen vammautuneen alligaattorin. Miamin tahan mennessa suurimmassa kaappauksessa maatilalta pelastetaan 400 elainta!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Manaatin pelastus. Manaatin rapylan dramaattinen pelastus paljastaa salaisuuden. Tutkija Casadevall etsii salametsastajia, joiden hyokkayksissa on kuollut useita karjaelaimia.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat taistelevat rikoksia vastaan ja suojelevat osavaltion luonnonvaroja. Valvojat loytavat rajajoelta laittomia verkkoja huumekuriireja etsiessaan.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Tiimi kulkee vihjeen perassa syrjaiselle joelle Gronlannissa, mista pitaisi loytya rautua. He selvittavat myos tarua, jonka mukaan atlantinlohi pesii yksinaisella joella.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Kaksi elakelaista Wisconsinista rakennuttaa maatilalleen aittamaisen puumajan. Pete suunnittelee kolme luksusosastoa ja terassin, josta on nakyma alpakoiden tallille.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Kausi 10 osa 12/21. Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. (Pit Bulls And Parolees, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kausi 8, osa 11. Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi. (My Cat from Hell, perhesarja, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Grace-vauva tutkii maailmaa, samalla kun Robert ja tiimi yrittavat tehda Australian elaintarhan suurimman alligaattorin siirron. Terri avustaa sumatrannorsuja.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff loytaa koiralta ison kasvaimen. Elainlaakariteknikko Kelly hoitaa oman koiransa auringonpolttamaa kirsua. Elainlaakarit Baier ja Hector hoitavat yhdessa biisonia.

programme.title: Luonnon oudoimmat mysteerit
programme.desc: Kuinka erikoinen luonto voikaan parhaimmillaan olla! Elaimet kayttaytyvat meidan silmiille kovin oudosti ja erilaisissa tapahtumaketjuissa ei tunnu olevan mitaan jarkea. Niinpa asiantuntijoista koostuva ryhma on valmiina ratkaisemaan luonnon oudoimmat mysteerit.

programme.title: Luonnon oudoimmat mysteerit
programme.desc: Kuinka erikoinen luonto voikaan parhaimmillaan olla! Elaimet kayttaytyvat meidan silmiille kovin oudosti ja erilaisissa tapahtumaketjuissa ei tunnu olevan mitaan jarkea. Niinpa asiantuntijoista koostuva ryhma on valmiina ratkaisemaan luonnon oudoimmat mysteerit.

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: Alaskan kolmiona tunnetulta alueelta etsitaan siella huhujen mukaan piileskelevia mystisia luontokappaleita.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Villit ja vapaat Brownit elavat Alaskan eramaassa. Seitsenlapsisen perheen elama kaikkien modernien mukavuuksien ulkopuolella riippuu perheenjasenten keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat taistelevat rikoksia vastaan ja suojelevat osavaltion luonnonvaroja. Valvojat loytavat rajajoelta laittomia verkkoja huumekuriireja etsiessaan.

programme.title: Weird, True And Freaky: Real Monsters
programme.desc: Ohjelma listaa kymmenen verisinta hyokkaysta, joiden tekijoina on mm. massiivisia hirvioita, kiemurtelevia kaarmeita, veitsihampaisia kissoja ja merien salakavalia tappajia.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Madagaskarin Pachy-makit olivat punaturkkisia, lahes isojen apinoiden kokoisia jattilaisia. Forrest etsii puiden latvustosta todisteita, etta laji on edelleen hengissa.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa kaksi puumajaa 13-vuotiaalle esiintyja Grace VanderWaalille. Tiimi rakentaa boheemin klubitalon ja ikkunaseinaisen taideateljeen.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Tiimi etsii Mosambikista hengenvaarallista paholaisenkukan rukoilijasirkkaa. Terien ja koukkujen peittama hyonteinen on lahes huomaamaton, silla se nayttaa trooppiselta kukalta.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat uivat alligaattorivesissa pelastaakseen vammautuneen alligaattorin. Miamin tahan mennessa suurimmassa kaappauksessa maatilalta pelastetaan 400 elainta!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Manaatin pelastus. Manaatin rapylan dramaattinen pelastus paljastaa salaisuuden. Tutkija Casadevall etsii salametsastajia, joiden hyokkayksissa on kuollut useita karjaelaimia.

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: Alaskan kolmiona tunnetulta alueelta etsitaan siella huhujen mukaan piileskelevia mystisia luontokappaleita.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: UUSI SARJA! Kausi 1, osa 1. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Shaun taistelee kovassa tuulessa pelastaessaan suloista Tigger-kissaa, joka on ennenkin jaanyt kiikkiin korkeuksiin. Lisaksi Tom tulee hatiin Fritterin luo.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 6/10. Canopy Cat Rescue on erikoistunut puihin kiivenneiden kissojen pelastamiseen. Kun nelijalkainen saadaan vihdoin takaisin tukevasti maanpinnalle alkaa selvitystyo, kenen lemmikki on kyseessa. (Treetop Cat Rescue, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Robert hoitaa vihaista Bunker-vompattia. Jattianakonda Nikilla on edessaan muuttopaiva. Terri hoitaa satoja sateenkaarilureja, jotka ovat loukkaantuneet raekuurossa.

programme.title: Project Grizzly
programme.desc: Jeff aloittaa elinikaisen haaveensa ja alkaa sopeuttaa Bobia ja Screechia takaisin luontoon. Kalanpyynti on odotettua vaikeampaa ja Bob jaa taidoissa jalkeen.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Dan McKernan jatti kaupunkielaman taakseen, muutti Michiganin maaseudulle ja perusti maatilalleen elainsuojelualueen. Sarjassa otetaan katsaus tilan sydanta lammittaviin pelastustarinoihin ja jokapaivaiseen elamaan.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Madagaskarin sademetsassa tiimi etsii lahes nakymatonta otusta, nimittain pantterikameleonttia. Matelija nayttaa kokeiden perusteella uhmaavan fysiikan lakeja.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Kamppailu elamasta. Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat pyrkivat saamaan oikeutta laiminlyodylle koiralle ja sen pennulle, ja tutkija Casadevall rientaa auttamaan Miamin kuumuudessa karsivia koiria.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elaman jano. Sarjassa seurataan Miami-Daden poliisilaitoksen elainpalveluyksikon tutkijoita taistelussa elaimiin kohdistuvaa julmuutta vastaan.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat soluttautuvat mustaan porssiin taistelemaan laitonta villielainkauppaa vastaan. Kiinni jaanyt laiton myyja menee sekaisin.

programme.title: The Dark Side of the Sun
programme.desc: Vasta hiljattain ovat tutkijat alkaneet ymmartaa lahimman tahtemme eli auringon todellista olemusta. Millainen on sen menneisyys ja tulevaisuus ja miten se vaikuttaa maapalloon?

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa kaksi puumajaa 13-vuotiaalle esiintyja Grace VanderWaalille. Tiimi rakentaa boheemin klubitalon ja ikkunaseinaisen taideateljeen.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Villalobos keraa varoja pelastuskeskukselle jarjestamalla Halloween-juhlat. Vanha ystava palaa takaisin, ja Lizzy joutuu vaikeaan irtokoiran pelastustehtavaan keskella yota.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Nelja taistelevaa kissaa on jakanut eraan huushollin kahtia. Kissalan reviiririidat ovat pakottaneet kaksi kissaa elamaan vuosia erakkoina eristyksessa.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Robert hoitaa vihaista Bunker-vompattia. Jattianakonda Nikilla on edessaan muuttopaiva. Terri hoitaa satoja sateenkaarilureja, jotka ovat loukkaantuneet raekuurossa.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Perhe elaa ahtaassa kodissa pelastamiensa elainten kanssa. Elaimiin kuuluu mm. kaksi minihevosta, jotka nukkuvat vanhempien makuuhuoneessa! Antonio rakentaa niille tallin.

programme.title: Beast Lands
programme.desc: Yhdessa aseistetun joukon kanssa Dave auttaa suojelemaan Koillis-Intian kylia, joissa riehuvat norsut mellastavat keskella yota.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Villit ja vapaat Brownit elavat Alaskan eramaassa. Seitsenlapsisen perheen elama kaikkien modernien mukavuuksien ulkopuolella riippuu perheenjasenten keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat soluttautuvat mustaan porssiin taistelemaan laitonta villielainkauppaa vastaan. Kiinni jaanyt laiton myyja menee sekaisin.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Labradorinnoutaja Maxilla on henkilokohtainen siipi talossa. Didga -kissa on niin cool, etta se rullalautailee rannalle ja mini-possu penkoo roskiksia ruokajamien toivossa.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Forrest jaljittaa tutkijan kanssa Newfoundlandista valkosutta, joka julistettiin sukupuuttoon kuolleeksi vuonna 1930. He tapaavat metsastajan, joka vaittaa ampuneensa yhden.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete pystyttaa puumajan McKinley-vuoren Princess Wilderness Lodge -kohteeseen. A-runkoisesta taidonnaytteesta on mahtavat nakymat Alaskan vuoristoon.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Liikemies Brad Jennings tilaa uuden toimistonsa loppusilaukseksi kolme akvaariota. Niissa nakyy lisahuoneita, joista yhdessa on jopa toimiva takka!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Kamppailu elamasta. Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat pyrkivat saamaan oikeutta laiminlyodylle koiralle ja sen pennulle, ja tutkija Casadevall rientaa auttamaan Miamin kuumuudessa karsivia koiria.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elaman jano. Sarjassa seurataan Miami-Daden poliisilaitoksen elainpalveluyksikon tutkijoita taistelussa elaimiin kohdistuvaa julmuutta vastaan.

programme.title: Tutankhamun with Dan Snow
programme.desc: In this episode, we unravel the riddle of Tutankhamuns unusually small tomb and reveal how Tut mania, the craze of King Tut gripped the world.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada
programme.desc: Kim and Pierre turn their attentions to harvesting big game; Mike returns home to discover a cabin in much need of repair; Now in Lutsel Ke, Becky tries to sort out her green team of sled dogs; Bentley accelerates his winter trapping preparations.

programme.title: Programme to be Confirmed
programme.desc: Programme to be confirmed.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Special compilation episode following seven people who live in one of the worlds loneliest places. They must overcome snow storms, frozen terrain and limited resources to survive.

programme.title: Wonders of the Solar System
programme.desc: All life on Earth needs water so the search for aliens in the solar system has followed the search for water. Professor Brian Cox examines the patterns in the ice on Jupiters moon Europa, which reveal an ocean far below with more potentially life-giving water than all the oceans on Earth. But of all the wonders of the solar system forged by the laws of nature, there is one that stands out as Brian reveals the greatest wonder of them all.

programme.title: Iceland with Alexander Armstrong
programme.desc: On the last leg of his Icelandic adventure, Alexander heads to the south of the country, where he takes in some of the countrys most spectacular scenery

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Yesterday HD12:00 PM to 1:00 PMThursday 4 JanuaryShareAdd to Calendar+Palermo to Mt EtnaSeason 7 Episode 4 of 10SSubtitlesOn a railway journey from the capital Palermo, through the ancient town of Agrigento and the port of Siracusa, to Europes largest volcano, Mount Etna, Michael Portillo explores Sicilian life under the dictatorship. He also finds out how the dictator took on the Mafia and asks whether it is true that under Mussolini, the trains ran on timeGreat Continental Railway Journeys airs on Yesterday HD at 12:00 PM, Thursday 4 January. programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Adventurer Ben Fogle journeys to the mountains of central Portugal, to live with Alex, a British man who traded in his lucrative retail career for his own mountainside hideaway. Later, Ben lollipops trees to protect them from forest fires.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben ventures to the Emerald Isle to visit Georg and Bettina, an elderly couple from Austria and Germany who made the Irish wilderness their home nearly 40 years ago.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskan residents look to restock their food supplies as spring brings longer days. This season, the hardy residents face fresh threats to their survival. 12/20

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: The stunning discovery of an executed man in Northern Italy reveals the brutal truth behind the Roman practice of crucifixion and sheds new light on the most famous crucifixion of all. 1/6

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness and Cherry Healey visit a factory that produces three million books every week and makes 20,000 hardback copies of Pride and Prejudice.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild
programme.desc: The secrets of canid success and their incredible strategies for survival, from leaping jackals to sneezing African wild dogs, and gray foxes that climb trees.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Yesterday HD12:00 PM to 1:00 PMFriday 5 JanuaryShareAdd to Calendar+Linz to BratislavaSeason 7 Episode 5 of 10SSubtitlesMichael Portillo travels by train through Austria and the Czech Republic, beginning in the northern Austrian city of Linz, where Adolf Hitler lived as a young boy. From here, Michael travels onto Prague Central Station, where he meets 87-year-old Zuzana Maresova, who, as a seven-year-old girl climbed aboard a train to travel to safety in London with hundreds of other Jewish children. Eventually crossing the Czech border into Slovakia, Michael reaches his final destination, one of Europes youngest capital cities, BratislavaGreat Continental Railway Journeys airs on Yesterday HD at 12:00 PM, Friday 5 January. (Subtitles.)TopicsLeisure hobbiesTourism TravelMichael PortilloPresenterAlison KrepsSeries EditorJohn ComerfordExecutive ProducerCassie FarrellDirector

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild

programme.desc: Around 12,000 years ago, as the Ice Age finally thawed, humanity made a dramatic shift - abandoning nomadic life for permanent settlements. 5/5

programme.title: Inside the Factory

programme.desc: There are about 2,000 thunderstorms taking place on Planet Earth at any given time. Despite their exhilarating beauty, they can be deadly. Given the right conditions, these storms can easily evolve into supercells which can then produce hurricanes and tornadoes.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild
programme.desc: Rescuers in South Africa try to combat Broken Heart Syndrome in wild dogs separated from their families. In Wyoming scientists discover the tiny swift foxs chances of survival can depend on their personality. In the mountains of Japan a naturalist is on the hunt for the extinct Japanese Wolf after an encounter that he believes proves they still exist. Conservationists in North America are in a race against time to save the red wolf as less than 20 remain in the wild.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Yesterday HD12:00 PM to 1:00 PMMonday 8 JanuaryShareAdd to Calendar+Stockholm to the Arctic CircleSeason 7 Episode 6 of 10SSubtitlesMichael Portillo embarks on a thousand-mile journey from the Swedish capital of Stockholm to Abisko in the northern reaches of the Arctic Circle. In Stockholm, Michael braves a precarious tour of the city from its rooftops before boarding a heritage tram to get the lowdown on 1930s Sweden from an expert. Moving on, he finishes his journey deep in the Arctic Circle at a remote climate research station. He also has lunch with traditional Sami people in Vilhelmina and checks into an ice hotelGreat Continental Railway Journeys airs on Yesterday HD at 12:00 PM, Monday 8 January. (Subtitles.)TopicsLeisure hobbiesTourism TravelMichael PortilloPresenterAlison KrepsSeries EditorJohn ComerfordExecutive ProducerBen RowlandDirector

programme.title: The Secret Life of Trees
programme.desc: Even the mightiest oak must start life as a tiny acorn. We explore the secret lives of young trees, discovering how they magically transform from minute seeds into mature adults. programme.title: Suuri ompelukisa
programme.desc: Lamminhenkinen kisareality. Hyvantuulisessa ompelukisassa 10-12 harrastajaa ottaa haasteen vastaan ja neulan kateensa kilpaillakseen paremmuudesta. Kipailijoita testataan kaikessa ompeluun liittyvassa, materiaalien hallinnassa, ompelutekniikassa ja suunnittelussa. Jokaisessa jaksossa on kolme erilaista tehtavaa ja juontajana toimii koomikko Joe Lycett. Sarja on ollut suosittu Britanniassa ja se on koonnut television eteen seka innostuneet harrastajat etta asiaan perehtymattomat. (The Great British Sewing Bee, S5-7. Britannia, 2019-2021.)

programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: Bloomberg anchor David Westin is joined by economists, policy makers, chief executive officers, and influential and thought-provoking leaders for a round table discussion over the stock markets and various geopolitical topics.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The China Show
programme.desc: Your definitive source for news and analysis on the worlds second-biggest economy. Hosted by Yvonne Man and David Ingles.

programme.title: Insight with Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East And Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the regions trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, well tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Opening Trade
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down the biggest stories of the day and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse with Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Experienced anchors report and discuss the days biggest business and economic developments in the United States and around the world, offering their unique perspectives and detailed analyses with timely updates on the markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Bloomberg Open Interest with Matt Miller and Dani Burger - delivers the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg ETF IQ

programme.desc: Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Gumball is convinced there is a Secret Society in school and he wants in. / Can Gumball and Darwin get through a whole week without somebody ruining the movie theyre going to see? / Gumball and Darwin hit snooze too much on their alarm clock and miss the school-bus. / Things keep going missing in the house so its up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit. / Gumball is in a funk that is proving hard to shake, he refuses to get out of bed. / To impress the mother of Anais playdate Nicole forces her family to get classy.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin watches a Health and Safety video and gets carried away. He tries to protect them from the world around them and soon Darwins over-protective control-freakery spreads to every corner of Elmore. The Wattersons have no choice but to overthrow his despotic regime.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: After tasting Masamis gourmet, double-truffle mac-n-cheese at lunch, Gumball decides to do whatever it takes to get a full serving of the delicious meal.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: In the midst of a heatwave, Richard enlists Gumball, Darwin and Anais to assist him in his mission to jump in the Robinsons newly-installed above ground pool.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage. / Mr Bean goes to buy the biggest TV in the world only to find that it has a price- tag to match.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes man overboard and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot is too tired to give anyone advice, he asks Mush-Mush to answer the Mushables requests on his behalf. But now Mush-Mush thinks he is the leader of Mushton!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chep thinks he has remembered that he is younger than his two best friends, Mush-Mush and Lilit, it affects his whole confidence.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are ecstatic: Muddlers fear of spiders rid the forest of him! But they soon learn that even Muddler is essential to the health of the forest.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit looks up to Chanterelle as an awesome role model. She would so love to be like her one day. But when she starts imitating Chanterelle it doesnt go to plan.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has a bad feeling. There is something he knows he should remember but cant. When he finally pieces his memories together, he gets what his bad feeling was about Mushton is about to be attacked by a plague of hungry woodworms! Prepare the defences!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy babysits for the she-bear he has a crush on. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up for he has no intention of taking any risks! But he hadnt reckone

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar proof safe.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Its hot out and when Grizzy sees an ice cream commercial on TV, he has a sudden craving. Unfortunately, the Lemmings made it to the deep-freeze in the garage before him and emptied it out to make themselves a sled run in the backyard with strawberry-vanilla ice cream. For Grizzy, theres no question that the stock they possessively watch over in an icebox winds up as powder snow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon... which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment. Starving, Grizzy decides to melt the ice with the blow-dryer. Only the Lemmings are already using it for their latest rocket game in the piping system.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks. They have a blast straddling these fabulous toys, swirling in every which direction, but their new game is not really compatible with a bears nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Puff doesnt like change much. And with spring about to burst forth and all the changes spring brings, he is puffing out nervous fog which is blanketing the whole of Mushton. Mush-Mush and friends need to get Puff to relax and celebrate spring together with all the other Mushables!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: So Mushpie can take a break, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to look after the Mushies, assuring her that everything will be fine. But a Mushie pops to become a Mushlet and escapes. Our friends find him in Muddlers clutches! Now, they must figure out a way to save the Mushlet and return the other Mushies to their cave before the return of Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlets love Mush-Mushs heroic stories. But when they demand to see him actually do something heroic, Mush-Mush feels he cant back out... and so ends up stuck up a cliff. Relieved to be rescued by Chep and Lilit, Mush-Mush is about to admit that he isnt a hero when the Mushlets find themselves in danger. Now Mush-Mush has no choice but to be a real hero!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. When the whistle disappears, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit soon discover that it has been stolen by a beetle. In order to finally hear what a real Nightingale sounds like, theyll have to get it back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers... a job that takes time and care. Soon Mush-Mushs haste causes disaster when he scares all the bees away. Now Mush-Mush and friends have to find a way to lure the bees back...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to avoid the Lemmings outboard speedboat, Grizzy punctures his air mattress and is propelled into a hidden grotto where he finds a conch decorated with Maori symbols that can control whales. Grizzy returns, proudly straddling his cetacean and chases the Lemmings from his peaceful spot. But the Lemmings imagination is equal to the size of this potential new playmate!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While arguing over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings happen upon a polar bear cub who is crying. When the little bear sees them, he wails even louder. Annoyed by his sobs, Grizzy and the rodents try to pacify him, but nothing works. After feeding and changing him, the baby finally falls asleep. How can they pick up their Yummy battle without waking the cub?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A meteorite falls not far from the cabin. While the Lemmings are sledding outside on a metal pot lid, their sled is abruptly drawn to the extraterrestrial boulder.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a long line of dominos in the cabin that ends with several giant ice blocks and a rocket outside. Weary of not finding the peace and calm he loves so dearly, Grizzy sabotages the game. The rocket hits an ice block and blows up the cabin. Grizzy gets his hands on a machine that can sculpt ice. The bear dreams of an igloo, but the Lemmings have other projects.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. They are licking their lips. As they fight, they accidentally send the coveted egg flying amidst a group of penguins where a couple of winged creatures adopt it. They sit on the egg as if it were their offspring. Not intimidated, Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to get their hands on it, but the entire bird colony intervenes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings open a nightclub with blasting music and a disco ball in an igloo they have built not far from the cabin. The noise prevents Grizzy from sleeping. The bear confiscates the disco ball and propels the Lemmings far into the distance. They land in an ice cave where they discover a console that lights up the stars in the sky and controls the northern lights. The canopy of heaven starts blinking. The Lemmings transform the ice field into an open-air discotheque!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Before an audience of penguins and walruses, two teams of Lemmings perform acrobatic high jumps, competing for the winning prize. When Grizzy accidentally jumps in, he quickly gets caught up in the game and the clapometer goes wild! Intoxicated by his victory, the bear is by no means a modest winner! But the Lemmings want their moment of glory in the limelight as well!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one thats perfect but is outraged when hes told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers hes one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find its closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their relaxing holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero Super Spy and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: De gang gaat naar een festival voor de Dag van de Doden. Daar komen ze erachter dat de geest van een oude legendarische crimineel, El Bandito, is teruggekeerd om de bevolking angst aan te jagen. Fred raakt geobsedeerd met het mysterie en wil onderdeel van de legende worden.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne agrees to watch her friends kid, Wayne, and convinces Fred to take a night off from mysteries to go to the boardwalk amusement park. Unbeknownst to her, though, the park is being haunted by a fiendish clown, Madcap.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover! / When the Legion of Zoom gains control of the Batcaves giant T-Rex, MOE creates a giant Bat-robot to stop the marauding dinosaur. / When the Legion of Zoom gains control of the Batcaves giant T-Rex, MOE creates a giant Bat-robot to stop the marauding dinosaur.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build a festive course for the Fall foot race. Wile E. Coyote is determined to beat the Road Runner with his Robo-Runner despite its malfunctions.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Beans life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clints catchphrase Nobody gets left behind, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wickets flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around yum! But hes told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artists studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time hes let in, but will Beans fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and hell get a months rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout doing all Mr Beans work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The orange blob is down at the Museum, nerding out about ancient Egypt, when the Docs show up and ruin Lamputs day. Darn science geeks. No respect for culture. A superior knowledge of history keeps Lamput one step ahead of the blue boffins - how many times can two chemists get kicked out of the same Museum? The Docs sneak back into the exhibition disguised as mummies. They learn the hard way that a disguise can be TOO good; they get locked into a glass box overnight. Lucky break, though; this is the night when a renowned jewel thief tries to steal the museums precious treasures. Lamput and the Docs get tangled up in the heist. The rest is history.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In an accident during a chase, Lamput ends up getting stuck to Specs! Since they are literally inseparable, they bond over time until Boss commands Specs to return to the Lab.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput decides to help distressed duck parents find their missing children. But the ducklings are too much for him to handle!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play with poseable figurines of wild Canadian animals. When Grizzy sees that the bear figurine has been put inside a little cage, whereas those of the Lemmings are gathered around a mini-jar of chocolate spread, he decides to join in the party and take control of his own figurine.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a new generation Tamagotchi game on the Rangers tablet: the camera scans the player and gives him a virtual avatar of himself to take care of.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings find a native American Indian vase with a genie inside that will make anyones dreams come true, if they only let him out by rubbing the vase. There is nonetheless one little snag: the effects of the genies magic instantly wear off as soon as he returns to his vase and the lid shuts.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike orders Tom and Jerry to watch Tyke while hes away, but instead Tom takes the opportunity to chase Jerry in the backyard. Suddenly, Tyke is nowhere to be seen and the front gate is wide open! Tom and Jerry must find the pup in time or face Spikes beating.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: On the edge of the village of Catsylvania, Tom is carried off to Dr. Frankensteins castle lab. Several lightning bolts later, a monster comes to life: a nine-foot-tall hulk with Toms relatively tiny head sewn on. Frankenstein orders the monster to go terrorize the village, but it has problems focusing after Toms head sees Jerry in the lab.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerry go to a pool party at Toodless place, Tom shows off in the pool with ridiculous stunts. Butch and Meathead arrive, adding more rivalry to the party. Soon, Toodles suggests they play a game of water polo, which reaches a fever pitch before long.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike the bulldog comes to Tom and Jerry, complaining he is being harassed by unknown creditors, ex-girlfriends, and other problems due to identity theft. They take the case on and go in search of who could be using Spikes name. It quickly becomes equally confusing for them to sort out.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A fast-talking sales cat named Dr. Jake L. appears to Tom from a trap door in the floor, selling Ache-Eee Bones tonic. However, when the doctor sees Jerry and Tuffy, he instantly turns into the slobbering Mr. Hyde-Cat and chases them, but then changes back to the doctor. Tom wants to buy the tonic but soon finds out whats happening with the visiting cat and tries to get rid of him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger argue on their anniversary, Cupid decides to get involved. However, he gets a head injury in a chase between Tom and Jerry and forgets who he is. Now its on Tom and Jerry to remind Cupid of his identity and help Ginger and Rick stop fighting.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Now that Catwoman has equipped Kitty with wings, Batwing tries to teach the easily-distracted Kitty how to fly. / When Harley Quinns Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Harley Quinns Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her. / A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Velmas got an interview at the prestigious Kingston University the most selective school in the country. The only catch? The dean wants her and the rest of the Scooby gang to figure out why the ghost of Elias Kingston the schools founder is haunting Kingstons book-filled halls!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brengt de gang mee naar een Victoriaans moordmysteriefeest, zodat ze zich mooi kunnen aankleden en een nepmysterie kunnen oplossen voor de verandering. Maar wanneer een onthoofde graaf (DAVID KAYE) daadwerkelijk mensen begint te ontvoeren, moet de gang boef pakken!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed from the ice which had preserved him for millions of years, a saber-toothed bear bursts into the cabin, starving to death. Grizzy fails to protect his reserves while the Lemmings fail at taming him for the rodeo - even though they all team up. But when they realize that a prehistoric necklace will enable them to control the creature, its each man for himself again!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces for a window of several seconds. How can Grizzy prevent the infiltrating Lemmings from stealing his jar of chocolate spread?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have found an Amerindian eagle amulet that endows he who wears it with the powers of a bird of prey. Grizzy would like to impress his beloved she-bear by soaring majestically through the sky. But to confiscate the magic totem from the Lemmings, who are now as sharp as eagles, Grizzy will have to use the cunning... of a puma.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with the rangers electric guitar and the cabin walls tremble with their experimental rock. Just as Grizzy is about to destroy the instrument, he realizes it can make harmonious sounds too. Will this be enough to seduce the she-bear hes in love with?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To finally be on an equal footing with Grizzys imposing build and throw their own weight around in the cabin, the Lemmings decide to wear a blowup sumotori costume. Grizzy is roughly chucked out of the living room area. He decides to follow a special sumo diet to become the strongest guy around.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events. They relive their prehistoric ancestors first confrontations, and learn that chocolate spread was invented long, long ago.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover an old book of magic spells with a formula that enables one to take on the appearance of any other creature. The Lemmings have the bright idea of transforming one their kin into a double of the she-bear Grizzy is madly in love with in order to trick him. How could Grizzy refuse to give his jar of chocolate spread to his sweetheart?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy propels the Lemmings out of the log cabin perched on the Great Wall of China, the critters land on a small traditional house in a bamboo forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain. Instead, they discover the art of energy points in an old Chinese medicine book. Determined to recover their sweets regardless of the cost, the Lemmings activate Grizzys vital points and the bear finds himself completely blocked. Thanks to the book, Grizzy frees himself and learns to master energies in turn.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick accidentally locks Tom and Jerry in the garage.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The butler asks Tom to rid the upstairs of a mouse before the owners return. If Tom succeeds, hell live and work the rest of his life upstairs.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry find themselves in a garden growing contest that turns out badly for Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom has planned an afternoon rendezvous with Toodles.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An overly ambitious young house sitter ruins Toms plans to rule the roost while Rick and Ginger are away. Jerry relishes in Toms predicament, that is until the house sitter spots the mouse and he becomes enemy number one!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Hildie receives another dozen black roses from a secret admirer, her curiosity is piqued. Sending Tom and Jerry to find out the identity of the mystery admirer, they end up at the Enchanted Flower Shop across the forest, where they encounter some frightful arrangements and a few dead ends.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A sales representative offers Tom all sorts of materials to finally catch Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ricks taken up painting to help him relax. Although hes warned them to stay out of his studio, Tom and Jerry inadvertently destroy his first painting. In an effort to reproduce it before he returns home, Tom and Jerry end up in a competition to prove whos the better artist. May the best Renoir win!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry try to locate a dog somewhere in the city, whose barking is keeping them awake.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: How does Mr Bean know Teddy? Could he drive a mini at the age of ten? How long has he known Mrs Wicket? Bean takes us on a journey into the past to answer these and many more questions.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: From competitive eating to channeling his inner superhero, Mr. Beans bungling antics land him in all sorts of new sticky situations this season.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they wont forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: On Halloween Night, Poison Ivy brings all the pumpkins to life, creating an army of Snack-O-Lanterns that are eating all the candy. Its up to Redbird and Bam to end her pumpkin panic to save Gothams Halloween fun, as well as their own.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird is convinced that nobody likes his eccentric dance moves, but when Toyman traps Robin behind a dance-themed gauntlet, its up to the rally car to dance his way to victory! / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: Krypto smells something special in a holiday package, and in his eagerness to grab the gift he makes a mess of Metropoliss festivities. / While escaping from a grizzly bear Ivandoe and Bert fall into an underground cave where a large Troll-woman in a party dress keeps them captive.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: Krypto embarks on a high-flying chase that creates major mayhem for a bus driver on his way to school. / The Bear is struggling against a greedy moth in his house. Trying to save his magic box he puts it on the porch and Masha finds the magic hat that can make her invisible

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Zaida Gator hires The Looney Builders to build her a boat so she can share her beignets in the swamp. She soon realizes there are others to share with elsewhere and enlists the crew to make it possible.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When the Looney Builders build themselves a playground, Daffy gets so excited about his section that he takes all the supplies for himself.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Squirm and Manny find a shiny ring while out fishing, but a mysterious creature lurks in water below

programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces for a window of several seconds. How can Grizzy prevent the infiltrating Lemmings from stealing his jar of chocolate spread?

programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events. They relive their prehistoric ancestors first confrontations, and learn that chocolate spread was invented long, long ago.

The Lemmings have the bright idea of transforming one their kin into a double of the she-bear Grizzy is madly in love with in order to trick him. How could Grizzy refuse to give his jar of chocolate spread to his sweetheart?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput, The Docs, The Thief and Droopy are all approaching the end of a typical day - the Docs are chasing Lamput, the thief has achieved the perfect gallery art heist and Droopy has finished his day at the office. But an unexpected collision causes confusion when their briefcases get muddled up and they each end up with each others belongings. Its not long before they find out about the mistake, but who has whose stuff? And how will they get it back?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursuit of Lamput takes them to the North Pole, where Lamput is taking photographs of arctic wildlife. The Docs decide to disguise themselves as various animals to get close to Lamput, only to be thwarted each time by the same animals theyre pretending to be, including a polar bear mother and her cub.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: A freak accident causes Lamput to grow giant in size! The two Docs must find a way to deal with this gargantuan problem and catch him roaming the big city!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers market with Irma at her knitwear stall right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but cant afford it. When he visits a food truck thats laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clints catchphrase Nobody gets left behind, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wickets flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Beans landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you cant even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is jealous of the Lemmings new game: an interactive dance mat connected to the TV where the idea is to jump around and perform dance sequences. As they fight over the mat, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a hidden mechanism in one of the Great Wall of Chinas watchtowers. The mechanism activates a game on the walls paving stones that is similar to the interactive mat, only life size. On your marks, get ready, dance!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are hungry! While fighting over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the jar is destroyed. But Grizzy discovers an ingenious manner to recover the remains of another Yummy jar using instant Chinese noodles as inspiration. The result is delicious. Grizzy and the Lemmings will once again fight over this new Yummy-based recipe: Choco-noodles.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings, who are both starving, discover a temple dedicated to an ancestral brioche. According to the book lying open inside the temple, to obtain a perfect brioche you must gather three gold ingredients and set them on the altar. When the panda idol who guards the temple receives the offering, the person will receive his favorite food in abundance. Grizzy and Lemmings set out to find the sacred ingredients but there is no question of working together. May the best critter win!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An integrated circuit containing an artificial intelligence accidentally connects to Grizzys stuffed teddy bear, which comes to life like a modern-day Pinocchio. Grizzy educates the chip until it decides to connect to the Lemmings robot to play with them. When the AI becomes a teenager, it is no longer interested in either Grizzy or the Lemmings and prefers using a smartphone to keep learning. Grizzy and the Lemmings join efforts to try and reset the chips memory and relive its childhood phase over and over.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a large silkworm that produces an extremely soft and resilient elastic thread ad infinitum. The Lemmings consider the worm the ideal game companion, but Grizzy needs the worm to make his knitwear. To become masters of the silkworm, the close enemies will go to harsh extremes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a crate of cell phones: theres one for everyone. But before being able to play with their new toys, they need to charge the batteries. This operation uses all the electricity stored in the cabins solar battery and prevents Grizzy from watching TV. Grizzy soon realizes that this is the least of his worries, for living with the Lemmings and their phones is a guaranteed nonstop stream of noise pollution.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings catch a grasshopper that can give you whatever your heart desires in abundance. All you need to do is set the grasshopper on its head while concentrating hard on what you want. As discretion is not the Lemmings strong point, Grizzy ends up understanding where their profusion of toys is coming from. Grizzy decides that its his turn to hunt down the grasshopper.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a new passion: magic Chinese lanterns that they use for sound and light performances. Grizzy is not very enthusiastic about this new electric activity which keeps him from sleeping. While Grizzy thinks that he got rid of their lanterns, the Lemmings discover new high-tech lanterns capable of making even more of a ruckus.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay hands on an ancient console that lets you play life-sized games in the real world. The console emits magical streams of energy that randomly pick avatars to confront one another. Grizzy is chosen as the hero. He must leap onto platforms and confront both enemies and a fearsome leader: a panda equipped with bamboo sticks. The Lemmings are obviously in control of the joystick!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As the Lemmings rummage through an abandoned delivery tricycle filled with strange objects, they discover a delicious treasure: Yummy-filled Chinese brioches! Grizzy steals their tasty bounty and heads off to enjoy it alone in the cabin. The Lemmings find a mask in the tricycle that terrifies anyone who looks at it when its being worn by someone. The Lemmings intend to use their horrific new power to recover their stolen treats.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a jar of Yummy which is mysteriously sucked up into a strange gravestone locked with a puzzle. Grizzy smashes open the gravestone but it contains another box made of unbreakable wood protected with a codex system. Our characters crack the code and are sucked into the box in turn. They discover that to get out, they will have to resolve a series of new puzzles, each one more complex than the last.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a giant home cinema screen that transforms his favorite documentary film into an incredible light and sound experience. But his pleasure is ruined by the Lemmings fiesta. While he chases after his housemates to destroy their disco equipment, he discovers with astonishment that Asian clones of himself and the Lemmings are also engaged in a high-speed pursuit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has anticipated everything for his birthday and plans on spending a peaceful day in the cabin doing his favorite activities. But when the Lemmings find out its Grizzys birthday, they devise other plans. Farewell, Grizzys peaceful day - make way for the Lemmings party surprises!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Nutty Hill is suffering from a stifling heat wave. Searching in vain for a bit of cool air, Grizzy suddenly has a brilliant idea. Hell get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. One slight detail, the refrigerator shelves are already full of Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV he discovers that the pantry is empty!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed by the thawing ice, a mysterious giant egg slides up to the front door of the log cabin. The Lemmings watch the hatching of a large baby dinosaur that immediately mistakes them for his mummies. Grizzy cannot tolerate a new intruder like this in the cabin, but how does he earn the respect of a gang of Lemmings who are armed with a T-Rex, even it is only a baby?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to seduce the she-bear hes infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and slim down with the rangers bodybuilding equipment. But before starting his exercise routine, he will first have to settle the problem of the Lemmings, who are already using the machines as an amusement park.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By chance, Grizzy discovers that the rangers new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages. But the Lemmings see the new gadget more as a competition bumper car.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is making pastries at the bakery. He takes Jerry and Tuffy and puts them in the pastries. Tuffy and Jerry both escape and make a pastry of their own, scaring Tom away.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a party boat for Mac and Tosh when Tweety accidentally makes a mistake but doesnt ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders try to help Winston Whale by building him a mail truck, but Winston is used to working alone.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a lighthouse for Looneyburg, Lolas tablet breaks and she must rely on herself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders redesign the last hole of the ACME Acres miniature golf course. Porky is determined to make it just right for the children who will play on it.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Beaver Brothers hire The Looney Builders to build them a log cabin, but soon sidetrack the job by goofing around too much.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has a terrible no-good day after she keeps messing up and lets Joker get away. She doesnt think he can help Batgirl anymore, but a bad today doesnt mean itll be a bad tomorrow.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. / When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave. / Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show. / Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of Bat-Ball.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to drive a mile in each others wheels in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwings motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that theyre better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
